messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] NOW: MARY B.  WAS: (DELETE IF REPEAT TO SOME GROUPS) BEWARE SNAIL M...
messages.messageBody:
From: <LuvsToHomeschool@...>

<<If anyone needs help w/this, please give me a holler! I'm VERY
EXPERIENCED
(more than I want to be) in this area; and, LOL, I won't charge you a
thing!>>


As I was reading your post, I was thinking boy would I like to pick her
brain and get some tips!!! Then you volunteered!!
If you could e-mail me privately with any info I would be so appreciative.
This whole college thing is so new and confusing to me as far as what has to
be done. Not at all like when I was going. I feel ancient. <BG>

Thank you.

Mary B

messages.subject: NOW: MARY B.  WAS: (DELETE IF REPEAT TO SOME GROUPS) BEWARE SNAIL M...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/4/03 1:23:38 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Mary, That was my hope; that I could help save some other people some time.  I have enough
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/4/03 1:23:38 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
mummy124@... writes:

> I would have looked it over sooner or later, you just helped save me
> some time. Thanks again.
>
Mary,

That was my hope; that I could help save some other people some time. I have
enough experience filling out REAL Financial Aid forms, going to the library
(ahhh, yes, we used to have to do that) combing through the many manuals that
listed various scholarships based on various needs, ethnic backgrounds,
interests, etc.) that I KNOW this is a rip off. NEVER, EVER PAY FOR what IS FREE!
Glad to have helped.

If anyone needs help w/this, please give me a holler! I'm VERY EXPERIENCED
(more than I want to be) in this area; and, LOL, I won't charge you a thing!

Tracy

We forfeit three-fourths of ourselves in order to be like other people.

~Arthur Schopenhauer~


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
